title: Foxworth Thursday: Football is Back but is Tom Brady?
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth chat about the launch of Domonique's new podcast "The Domonique Foxworth Show", Tom Brady's absence from much of training camp, the Patriots offseason issues, and QB's under the most pressure. All that and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
